title: How to Make Sopapilla Cheesecake

steps.headline: Spray baking sheet lightly with cooking spray.
Open 1 package of crescent rolls or puff pastry roll and line the bottom of the pan with them.
In large bowl, beat together the 2 packages of softened cream cheese, sugar and vanilla until combined.
Spread the cream cheese mixture onto the crescent rolls(puff pastry roll) in pan with the spatula.
Take the other package of crescent rolls and put that on top of the cream cheese mixture.
Pour the melted butter over the top evenly, and then sprinkle the cinnamon and sugar mixture over it.
Put in the pre-heated oven for about 45 minutes or until the crescent rolls look golden.
steps.description: Let it cool for 5 minutes then cut and enjoy!

text: Pre-heat your oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Spray baking sheet lightly with cooking spray.  Open 1 package of crescent rolls or puff pastry roll and line the bottom of the pan with them.  In large bowl, beat together the 2 packages of softened cream cheese, sugar and vanilla until combined.  Spread the cream cheese mixture onto the crescent rolls(puff pastry roll) in pan with the spatula.  Take the other package of crescent rolls and put that on top of the cream cheese mixture.  Pour the melted butter over the top evenly, and then sprinkle the cinnamon and sugar mixture over it.  Put in the pre-heated oven for about 45 minutes or until the crescent rolls look golden. Let it cool for 5 minutes then cut and enjoy! Finished.
